text: Soni pamasile patupeleche ku ŵandu mu aji Qur’an ntundu uliose wachilandanyo. Nambo naga n’di ntite mwaichilile nacho (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ) chisimosimo chilichose (chakulosya ukuona wa utume wenu), aŵala ŵaakufuulu chisimu chene mpaka ajile (pakwasalila ŵakulupilila): “Nganim’ba jenumanja ikaŵeje ŵakuya yaunami.”
